name: Dots: Revamped!
description:
The insanely popular Flash game DOTS got a huge sequel!

Gobble up Dots to fill your Rainbow Meter, then destroy your enemies with RAINBOW POWER!
In NewGame+ upgrades are taken away and replaced with Punishments! The bigger the punishment you choose, the more points you get per Dot!

FEATURES
Over 20 characters to unlock!
7 unlockable abilities!
Challenge Mode!
NewGame+ (Upgrades are taken away and replaced with Punishments!)

PLAY FOR FREE!
I encourage you to TRY THE GAME FOR FREE and if you like it; consider buying the Support The Dev DLC!


WANT MORE?
If you would like to see more content and updates, reach out to me on twitter @Starblinky and let me know what you'd like to see.
